domains.icp.title: ICP Filing Notice
domains.icp.desc1: If your server is in mainland China and the domain is not filed (ICP), port 80/443 (web access) might be blocked.
domains.icp.desc2: This does NOT affect email sending/receiving (SMTP port 25). Email services will work as long as DNS is correct.
domains.forward.title: Email Forwarding Rules
domains.modal.add_desc: SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records will be generated automatically. Ensure you have DNS management access.
domains.modal.prefix_hint: Recommended: "mail" or "smtp". Leave empty for root domain.
domains.modal.fwd_desc: Emails sent to the domain will be forwarded to the target address. Requires MX records pointing to this server and receiving service enabled.
domains.match.all: All - Catch-all emails for this domain
domains.modal.match_hint: Leave empty to match all (only for 'All' mode)
domains.alert.delete_confirm: Deleting domain will remove all configurations. Continue?
domains.cert.empty_hint: Click buttons above to upload or request certificates
domains.cert.upload_tip: After upload, the system will automatically parse certificate info (domains, expiry, etc.). Private key will be encrypted.
domains.cert.acme_desc: Use DNS-01 validation to get certificate without opening port 80/443. Certificates are valid for 90 days and can be renewed.
domains.cert.acme_dns_title: Please add the following DNS TXT record
domains.cert.acme_dns_hint: After adding DNS record, wait 1-5 minutes for propagation, then click verify.
domains.cert.apply_confirm: Apply this certificate to STARTTLS configuration? Requires service restart to take effect.
domains.cert.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this certificate?
